inputMethods.title: Select Video Source
inputMethods.dragDropText: Drag & Drop your Video or Audio here
inputMethods.supportedFormats: Supported formats: MP4, MOV, AVI, MP3, WAV, AAC, OGG
inputMethods.maxFileSize: (Video length is not important, but video too high in resolution or framerate will easily get the model overloaded)

output.audioStitchingWarning: Downloading video... Note: For qualities other than 360p, audio stitching is required which may take a long time, especially for videos over 1 hour.
output.processingVideo: Processing. This may take a few minutes...
output.retryGeminiTooltip: Try generating subtitles again with a new Gemini request
output.longVideoWarning: You uploaded a {{duration}} minute video. Processing can be longer than usual due to multiple Gemini calls.
output.longVideoProcessing: Processing video longer than 30 minutes. This may take a while...
output.clientSideSegmentation: Processing video in segments on your device...
output.serverSplitting: Uploading and splitting video on server...
output.someSegmentsFailed: Some segments failed to process. The subtitles may be incomplete.
output.strongModelWarning: You are choosing an easily overloaded model, please process each segment one by one. In case of overloading, create a new Google Cloud Project and get an API Key.
output.strongModelSuccess: Since you are choosing easily overloaded model, please press generate manually. In case of overloading, create a new Google Cloud Project and get an API Key.
output.segmentGenerateSuccess: Segment {{segmentNumber}} processed successfully and combined with existing subtitles
output.requestsAborted: All Gemini requests have been aborted

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeyDescription: Your API key is stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers.
settings.geminiApiKeyHelp: Required for all functions. Get one at
settings.youtubeApiKeyHelp: Required for YouTube search. Get one at
settings.oauthDescription: OAuth 2.0 provides more reliable access to YouTube API. Get credentials at Google Cloud Console
settings.createProject: Create a project in Google Cloud Console
settings.enableYouTubeAPI: Enable the YouTube Data API v3
settings.copyClientCredentials: Copy your Client ID and Client Secret
settings.pasteAndAuthenticate: Paste them into the fields above and click Authenticate
settings.redirectMismatchDescription: This error occurs when the redirect URI in your application doesn't match what's registered in Google Cloud Console:
settings.goToCredentials: Go to Google Cloud Console > APIs & Services > Credentials
settings.findOAuthClient: Find your OAuth 2.0 Client ID and click to edit
settings.accessDeniedDescription: This error can occur for several reasons:
settings.deniedPermission: You denied permission during the OAuth flow
settings.apiNotEnabled: The YouTube Data API is not enabled for your project
settings.apiRestrictions: There are API restrictions on your OAuth client
settings.goToLibrary: Go to Google Cloud Console > APIs & Services > Library
settings.searchYouTubeAPI: Search for "YouTube Data API v3" and make sure it's enabled
settings.checkRestrictions: Check your OAuth client for any API restrictions
settings.appNotVerifiedDescription: New OAuth applications start in "Testing" mode and can only be used by test users:
settings.goToConsentScreen: Go to Google Cloud Console > APIs & Services > OAuth consent screen
settings.addYourEmail: Add your Google email address as a test user
settings.verificationNote: Note: You don't need to wait for verification if you add yourself as a test user. Verification is only required if you want to make your app available to all users.
settings.showWaveformDescription: Display audio waveform visualization in the timeline. This helps identify silent parts and speech patterns.
settings.timeFormatDescription: Choose how time is displayed in the timeline and lyrics.
settings.geminiStep3: Create a new key or select existing
settings.geminiStep5: Paste it into the field above
settings.segmentDurationDescription: Choose how long each video segment should be when processing long videos. Shorter segments process faster but may be less accurate.
settings.geminiModelDescription: Select the Gemini model to use for transcription. Different models offer trade-offs between accuracy and speed.
settings.modelBestAccuracy: Gemini 2.5 Pro (Best accuracy, slowest, easily overloaded)
settings.modelSecondBest: Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking (Second best, slowest, less overloaded)
settings.modelThirdBest: Gemini 2.0 Flash (Third best, acceptable accuracy, medium speed)
settings.modelFastest: Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite (Worst accuracy, fastest - for testing only)
settings.transcriptionPromptDescription: Customize the prompt sent to Gemini for transcription. The {contentType} placeholder (shown as a floating icon) will be replaced with "video" or "audio" depending on the input type. This placeholder cannot be removed and is required for the transcription to work properly.
settings.promptPresetsDescription: Select a preset to quickly use common prompt types. You can also create your own presets.
settings.cacheDescription: Clear all cached subtitles and downloaded videos to free up space.
settings.cacheClearError: Error clearing cache. Please try again.
settings.confirmClearCache: Are you sure you want to clear all cached subtitles and videos? This cannot be undone.
settings.confirmUpdate: Are you sure you want to update the application? This will pull the latest changes from the repository.
settings.updateSuccess: Application updated successfully! Please refresh the page to see the changes.
settings.confirmFactoryReset: Are you sure you want to perform a factory reset? This will clear all cache files and browser data. This cannot be undone.
settings.factoryResetSuccess: Factory reset completed successfully. The application will now reload.
settings.creator: Creator
settings.appDescription: One-click Subtitles Generator is a tool that helps you generate, edit, and translate subtitles for your videos with just one click.

lyrics.timingInstructions: Drag the timestamps to adjust the timing of each subtitle. Sticky mode will adjust all following subtitles.

errors.apiKeyRequired: Please set your API key in the settings first.
errors.invalidInput: Please provide a valid input (YouTube URL, search result, or file upload).
errors.invalidFile: Invalid file format or size. Please check the supported formats.
errors.geminiOverloaded: Strong model tends to get overloaded, please consider using other model and try again, or try lower the segment duration. Or create a new Google Cloud Project and get an API Key.
errors.tokenLimitExceeded: The video segment is too large for Gemini to process. Please try with a shorter video or lower video quality.
errors.fileSizeTooLarge: File size ({{size}}MB) exceeds the recommended maximum of {{maxSize}}MB. Please use a smaller file or lower quality video.
errors.youtubeAuthRequired: YouTube authentication required. Please set up OAuth in settings.
errors.youtubeApiKeyRequired: Please set your YouTube API key in the settings to use this application.
errors.bothKeysRequired: Please set your Gemini API key and configure YouTube authentication in the settings to use this application.
errors.quotaExceeded: Quota exceeded, please wait tomorrow, or create a new Google Cloud project and update API or OAuth.

youtubeUrlInput.instructionsStep1: Find a YouTube video you want to generate subtitles for
youtubeUrlInput.instructionsStep2: Copy the URL from your browser address bar

youtube.searchError: Error searching YouTube. Please try again or enter a URL directly.
youtube.noApiKey: Please set your YouTube API key in the settings first.
youtube.noOAuth: Please authenticate with YouTube in the settings first.
youtube.authError: YouTube authentication required. Please set up OAuth in settings.

subtitleSettings.title: Subtitle Settings
subtitleSettings.noTranslationTooltip: Please generate a translation first in the Translation section below

download.consolidateExplanation: Converts subtitles into a coherent document, improving flow and readability while maintaining the original meaning.
download.summarizeExplanation: Creates a concise summary of the main points and key information, about 1/3 the length of the original text.

translation.title: Translate Subtitles
translation.description: Translate your edited subtitles to another language while preserving timing information.
translation.languagePlaceholder: Enter target language (e.g., Spanish, French, Japanese)
translation.error: Error translating subtitles. Please try again.
translation.splitDurationTooltip: Split subtitles into chunks for translation to avoid token limits
translation.splitDurationHelp: Splitting subtitles into smaller chunks helps prevent translations from being cut off due to token limits. For longer videos, use smaller chunks.
translation.splittingSubtitles: Splitting {{count}} subtitles into chunks of {{duration}} minutes

promptEditor.variablesInstruction: The following variables are represented by icons in the text area:
promptEditor.customizePromptDesc: Customize how Gemini processes your content.
promptEditor.customizeTranslationDesc: Customize how Gemini translates your subtitles.

onboarding.title: Welcome to Subtitles Generator
onboarding.promptSelectionSubtitle: First, let's select a prompt preset for your transcriptions
onboarding.modelSelectionSubtitle: Now, let's select a Gemini model for your transcriptions
onboarding.promptSelectionInstruction: Choose a preset that best fits your needs. You can always change this later in the settings.
onboarding.modelSelectionInstruction: Choose a Gemini model. More accurate models may be slower. You can always change this later in the settings.
onboarding.completed: Setup complete! You can change these settings anytime.

qualitySelector.hdQuality: HD quality (may cause issues with long videos)
qualitySelector.longVideoWarning: For videos longer than 1 hour, use 144p to avoid app crashes

timeline.waveformDisabled: Waveform visualization has been automatically disabled for videos longer than 30 minutes to improve performance.
